description: System-generated unique identifier for this procedure attribute data row.
ID of the attribute definition this value represents for the procedure; likely a foreign key to a procedure-attribute catalog; confirm with SME.
Recorded value for the specified attribute, as entered or computed (text/number/flag).
Identifier of the maintenance procedure to which this attribute value belongs; likely a foreign key to the procedures table; confirm with SME.
System timestamp when this record was last updated, regardless of user.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated modification; may duplicate last_modified in some implementations; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that originally created the record.
Timestamp when the record was originally created.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by a user or process.
